meanings.definition: Most clear or distinct in appearance or sound.
meanings.sent1: The blearest sky I've ever seen was on a sunny day.
meanings.sent2: The instructions were written in the blearest handwriting.
meanings.sent3: The blearest water in the lake made it easy to spot the fish.
meanings.sent4: Her voice was the blearest melody in the choir, standing out beautifully.
meanings.sent5: The blearest memory I have is of my first day at school, crystal clear in my mind.

meanings.definition: To make or become clear or distinct.
meanings.sent1: She tried to blearest the image on the blurry photograph.
meanings.sent2: The teacher's explanation helped to blearest the concept for the students.
meanings.sent3: He accidentally blearest the wrong document, causing confusion in the office.
meanings.sent4: The sunrise began to blearest the darkness of the night sky.
meanings.sent5: The detective's findings started to blearest the mystery surrounding the case.
